Description.Text: The 4-star Posh Pads Liverpool One Apart-Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Liverpool. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Posh Pads Liverpool One Apart-Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Liverpool or to simply relax and rejuvenate.
